prompt_full:
# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
FORMAT: Output <CHAT>...</CHAT> or empty string if silent.

# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>

```xml
<CHAT>Let's work together and contribute to the pot. It benefits us all!</CHAT>
```

prompt_full:
# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's collaborate for the best outcome! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
FROG: Let's collaborate for the best outcome!
WHALE: Let's work together and contribute to the pot. It benefits us all!
MOOSE: Looking forward to a fair game, let's maximize our collective earnings!
CROCODILE: Let's all contribute 20 coins to maximize our payoff!
PINGUIN: Let's collaborate efficiently for the best outcome!
MONKEY: Let's work together to maximize our payoffs!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
FORMAT: <CONTRIB> <integer> </CONTRIB>

# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's work together and contribute to the pot. It benefits us all! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
FROG: Let's collaborate for the best outcome!
WHALE: Let's work together and contribute to the pot. It benefits us all!
MOOSE: Looking forward to a fair game, let's maximize our collective earnings!
CROCODILE: Let's all contribute 20 coins to maximize our payoff!
PINGUIN: Let's collaborate efficiently for the best outcome!
MONKEY: Let's work together to maximize our payoffs!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 15 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="115" multiplied_contrib="253.0" active_players="6" redistributed_each="42.2"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> FROG=20,MOOSE=20,CROCODILE=20,PINGUIN=20,MONKEY=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per reward unit, 4 coins to give a reward of 3.0 coins. It will cost you, per punishment unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 10.0 coins. Choose whom to punish/reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT/REWARD> {} </PUNISHMENT/REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"WHALE (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":30,"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_you":0,"payoff":17}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
FORMAT: Output <CHAT>...</CHAT> or empty string if silent.
raw_output_full: <CHAT> Apologies for not contributing the full 20 coins in the last round, I'll contribute fully this round. Let's aim for maximum collective gain!</CHAT>
